title: Great way to initiate people
comment: No better way to show someone how it works, like playing with monopoly bills.
Wow, testnet, thanx
Does the job

title: Does the job
comment: Still unclear how to connect to a local network though using IP:port. That would be useful for testing on a local testnet that may run on another port than the standard one.
Bitcoin P2P is always on port 8333 (testnet: 18333).

Addresses aren't shown in the list so it isn't possible to copy them. Could cause confusion.   BIP39 isn't used which is a shame as I'd like to make a paper backup.   It isn't possible to edit the fee, which would seem rather easy to implement.

title: A must for developers
comment: (Nov 13) But, it really must support multisig addresses!..  (22/9/14) update to devs response: it didn't support this at the time I made the review, about a year ago. Thanks for the response all the same.
Why do you think it doesn't support sending to multisig? Of course it does.

title: Doesn't work
comment: This app doesn't work. All I get is a "No peers connected" messge in the network monitor.   It never connects to testnet.
This is probably caused by all of the peer discoveries being down. I just released version 4.0 which adds more peer discoveries.

title: Needs update
comment: No confirmations are being received
Super

title: Simple and functional
comment: Good UI simple interface.

title: Works on Testnet3
comment: Unfortunate that the anonymous author of the year+ old criticism hasn't corrected the now out-of-date review.

title: Simplest test coin wallet
comment: Only testcoin wallet that doesn't take 2 gigs of space and four hours to install. A must if your developing any sort of bitcoin application.

title: needs update for testnet3
comment: The latest bitcoin-git clients from gavinandresen are blocking clients with too old of protocol version.  You need to upgrade your client to match the testnet3 protocol, this is the reason why everyone cannot sync to current and nobody ever receives their testnet coins.  Regular bitcoin app from same author is a gem.  Still would be nice to export wallet.dat for import into standard bitcoind.

title: Blockchain downloading, 4 days behind. Forever.
comment: Installed it but cannot use it. Stalled indefinitely. Help.

title: Could be better.
comment: This app really needs a backup system. It would also be great if it saved the wallet.dat file to the sdcard.  Also, I can't download all the transaction history. Stalls at 4 weeks.

title: Stalls with 13 days to go...
comment: Reset doesn't work, not power or storage related. Generally finds six peers fast.
Fixed the uninstall issue, thanks!
